element.name: occupations
element.a:documentation: A group of occupation terms associated with a CWRC entity record. For more information see occupation element.

element.name: activities
element.a:documentation: A group of activity terms associated with a CWRC entity record. For more information see activity element.

element.name: researchInterests
element.a:documentation: A group of research interest terms associated with a CWRC entity record. For more information see researchInterest element.

element.name: genders
element.a:documentation: A group of gender terms associated with a CWRC entity record. For more information see gender element.

element.name: occupation
element.a:documentation: Occupation captures relevant paid occupations held by the person described in an entity record.

element.name: activity
element.a:documentation: Activity captures all unpaid work or function such as volunteer work or other significant activity that a person was engaged in. Examples: parenting, unpaid domestic labour, nursing, as well as philantropic, missionary, or other political activities.

element.name: interest
element.a:documentation: This field can capture a topic of interest associated with an entity (person or organization).

element.name: gender
element.a:documentation: Gender captures a group of gender terms associated with a person entity.

interface-field.help-text: An optional field to capture gender terms the present person is associated with.
interface-field.label: Gender

element.name: term
element.a:documentation: Term works as a generic field to capture terms associated with an entity in terms of occupation, activity, research interests, and gender.

interface-field.help-text: This field can capture relevant paid occupations held by the person described in the present record.
interface-field.label: Occupation

interface-field.help-text: The activity field captures all unpaid work or function such as volunteer work or other significant activity that a person was engaged in. Example: parenting, unpaid domestic labour, nursing, as well as philantropic, missionary, or other political activities.
interface-field.label: Activity

interface-field.help-text: This field can capture a topic of interest to the present entity.
interface-field.label: Research Interest

element.name: relations
element.a:documentation: A group of relations between a given entity and other entities. Equivalent to EAC-CPF\'s relation element, used as a wrapper for grouping one or more specific relations.

element.name: relation
element.a:documentation: Captures a relation between a given entity and other entities. For example, an organization, person, work, or place related to the described entity. Equivalent to EAC-CPF\'s cpfRelation (if the relation is to organizations and persons) or to resourceRelation (if the relation involves a work or title).

element.name: personRef
element.a:documentation: A person entity associated with the described entity. Used in relations section.

element.name: organizationRef
element.a:documentation: An organization entity associated with the described entity. Used in relations section.

element.name: placeRef
element.a:documentation: A place entity associated with the described entity. Used in relations section.

element.name: placeLat
element.a:documentation: Latitude of the place associated with the described place entity.

define.name: longitude-element
define.a:documentation: Longitude of the place associated with the described place entity.

define.name: featureType-element
define.a:documentation: Feature type of the place associated with the described place entity (e.g., populated place).

define.name: altitude-element
define.a:documentation: Altitude in meters of the place associated with the described place entity.

define.name: administrativeDivision-element
define.a:documentation: The ISO 3166-2 country subdivision name, or first-order administrative division name (e.g., provinces or states) that contains the place associated with the described place entity.

define.name: country-element
define.a:documentation: The ISO 3166-1 country name that contains the place associated with the described place entity.

define.name: URI-element
define.a:documentation: URI of a linked resource that describes a geographical location associated with the described place entity.

attribute.name: type
attribute.a:documentation: Generic type attribute available to classify types of relations.

element.name: originInfo
element.a:documentation: Record origin information. Equivalent to MADS recordInfo element, similar to EAC-CPF\'s control element.

element.name: projectId
element.a:documentation: Similar to EAC-CPF\'s agencyCode. In CWRC\'s context, projectId captures an identifieer for the originating project or collection. Subsequent modifications of the record should be captured in FOXML\'s datastreams

interface-field.label: Collection
interface-field.help-text: Select one or more collections to associate the present entity record with a project.
Optional. Specify a project that uses this as the preferred form of the name.
interface-field.label: Preferred name for

interface-field.help-text: Specify a project that is author of the present note.
interface-field.label: Note created by project

element.name: recordIdentifier
element.a:documentation: Provenance field used to capture original record identifiers. CWRC record identifiers are captured in entityId and in FOXML.

element.name: recordCreationDate
element.a:documentation: Provenance field used to capture the original creation date of an entity instance deposited in CWRC. Dates of creation for new entities created in CWRC are captured in FOXML. Equivalent to MADS recordCreationDate and EAC-CPF's maintenanceHistory/maintenance/Event/eventType[text()="created"]/eventDateTime .

element.name: recordChangeDate
element.a:documentation: Provenance field used to capture the original modification dates of an entity instance deposited in CWRC. Subsequent dates of modification in CWRC are captured in FOXML. Equivalent to MADS recordChangeDate and EAC-CPF's maintenanceHistory/maintenance/Event/eventType/eventDateTime .

element.name: resource
element.a:documentation: A source of evidence used in describing the entity or entities instances. Equivalent to EAC-CFPF\'s source element.

attribute.name: source
attribute.a:documentation: Provenance field used to capture the source responsible for the publication or modification of an entity record.

element.name: entityId
element.a:documentation: Optional CWRC record identifier. This information is captured in FOXML. Equivalent to EAC-CPF\'s recordId.

element.name: preferredForm
element.a:documentation: An element used to indicate which recorded entity name is the preferred one for display purposes in a given context.

interface-field.label: Standard Name
interface-field.help-text: Use this section to flag a name as a preferred form to identify a person or organization.

element.name: displayLabel
element.a:documentation: Display label of entity described if different than CWRC's preferredForm.

element.name: namePart
element.a:documentation: Used to distinguish components of the name of the entity. Equivalent to MADS\'s namePart and to EAC-CPF\'s part element.

interface-field.label: Name Part
interface-field.help-text: Required. Provide the person's or organization's standard name, by part, in natural order. Add more name parts if necessary. Person name example: Joyce (forename), Carol (middlename), Oates (surname). Organization name example: Conseil des Arts du Canada.

interface-field.label: Name Part
interface-field.help-text: Optional. Record one or more alternative names here, in natural order. Add more name parts if necessary. Sample person variant name: Mary Shelley's birth name should be entered as Mary (forename), Wollstonecraft (middlename), Godwin (surname). Sample organization name: Canada Council for the Arts.

attribute.name: partType
attribute.a:documentation: Captures types of name components of an entity. Example: forename.

interface-field.help-text: Optional. Select a type of name part from the list.
interface-field.label: Name Part Type

interface-field.help-text: Optional. Select a type of name part from the list.
interface-field.label: Name Part Type

choice.a:documentation: e. g. "Canada" in "Conseil des Arts du Canada"
e. g. "Canada" in "Conseil des Arts du Canada"

element.name: variantType
element.a:documentation: Captures tname type to describe contexts in which this name was used to refer to the present entity.

interface-field.help-text: If applicable, select a name type to describe contexts in which this name was used to refer to the present entity.
interface-field.label: Variant Name Type

choice.a:documentation: e. g. "Wrens" for "Women's Royal Naval Service"
e. g. "Wrens" for "Women's Royal Naval Service"

element.name: existDates
element.a:documentation: Dates of existence of the entity described (i.e. birth, death, fl., etc.), of the present entity.

interface-field.help-text: If known, enter dates of existence (i.e. birth, death, fl., etc.), of the present entity.
interface-field.label: Dates of Existence

element.name: personTypes
element.a:documentation: Captures generic person types defined by each project. Based on WEAC-CPF\'s @localType.

element.name: personType
element.a:documentation: Captures generic person types defined by each project. Based on WEAC-CPF\'s @localType.

interface-field.help-text: Generic person types defined by projects. Select a category from the list or specify a custom value.
interface-field.label: Person Type

element.name: level
element.a:documentation: Captures generic title types. Based on TEI\'s @level.

choice.a:documentation: (analytic) analytic title (article, poem, or other item published as part of a larger item)
(monographic) monographic title (book, collection, or other item published as a distinct item, including single volumes of multi-volume works)
(unpublished) title of unpublished material (including theses and dissertations unless published by a commercial press)

element.name: sameAs
element.a:documentation: Captures a link to a resource that contains information about this entity (e. g. an article about the entity that is subject of a record). This field is also useful to declare that the present entity likely refers to the same entity represented in another resource.
